entry.description: Mgt access from these hosts only.

entry.name: Block-Bad-URLs
entry.description: Blocks bad URLs based on categories

entry.name: Block-from-Known-Bad-Addresses
entry.description: Blocks traffic from known bad IP addresses to Users and Extranet

entry.name: Block-to-Known-Bad-Addresses
entry.description: Blocks traffic from Users and Extranet to known bad IP addresses

entry.name: Allow-PANW-Apps
entry.description: Allows PANW apps for firewall

entry.name: Users_to_Extranet
entry.description: Allows hosts in the Users_Net zone to access servers in the Extranet zone.

entry.name: Users_to_Internet
entry.description: Allows hosts in Users_Net zone to access Internet zone.

entry.name: Extranet_to_Internet
entry.description: Allows hosts in the Extranet zone to access Internet zone.

entry.name: Extranet_to_User_Net
entry.description: Allows hosts in the Extranet zone to access hosts in the User_Net zone.

entry.name: Allow-Corp-Apps
entry.description: Allows only approved apps for Acquisition users

entry.name: Allow-Mktg-Apps
entry.description: Allows only users of marketing group to access Mktg apps

entry.name: Deny-All-Others
entry.description: Denies non-approved applications for users in the Acquisition zone

entry.name: Inside_Nets_to_Internet
entry.description: Translates traffic from Users_Net and Extranet to 203.0.113.20 outbound to Internet

entry.name: Dest_NAT_to_Webserver
entry.description: Translates traffic to webserver at 192.168.50.80

entry.name: Corp-AV
entry.description: Standard corporate antivirus profile for all security policy rules

entry.name: Corp-Vuln
entry.description: Standard vulnerability profile for all security policy rules

entry.name: Corp-FileBlock
entry.description: Standard file blocking profile for all security policy rules

entry.name: US-SSNs
entry.description: US Social Security Numbers

entry.name: Corp-DataFilter
entry.description: Standard data filtering profile for all security policy rules

entry.name: Corp-AS
entry.description: Standard anti-spyware profile for all security policy rules

entry.name: Corp-URL-Profile
entry.description: Standard corporate URL profile for all security policy rules

entry.name: Block-Per-Company-Policy
entry.description: URLs that are blocked by company policy

entry.name: Corp-WF
entry.description: Wildfire profile for Corp security rules

domain.description: Custom list of bad domains maintained on Extranet server

url.description: List of malicious URLs maintained on Extranet server
